file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: Alert Manager Service - Ignore - Maybe Alert: ServiceInfo?
GroupShield Exchange - Infected file found / access denied.

FastField.defaultValue: GroupShield Exchange - Infected file (found / access denied)

FastPattern.matcher: <\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[^<]*<String1>\s*Heuristics has detected that (file .*) is infected with ([^\s]+) (.*) The file was successfully deleted.(.*)\s\s\</String1.*

<\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[^<]*<String1>\s*Heuristics has detected that (file .*) is infected with ([^\s]+) (.*) and has (.*)\. (Detected using .*)\s\s\</String1.*

<\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[^<]*<String1>\s*The file (.*) was infected with ([^\s]+) (.*) The file was successfully cleaned with (.*)\s\s\</String1.*

FastField.defaultValue: Error while cleaning boot sector virus

FastPattern.description: Mail virus quarantined and possibly cleaned
FastPattern.matcher: <\S+\s+[^>]*account="([^"]*)"[^>]*computer="([^"]*)"[^>]*eventId="([^"]*)"[^>]*source="([^"]*)"[^>]*timeGenerated="([^"]*)"[^>]*>[^<]*<String1>\s*(An email from .* infected with the virus) (.*) in attachment (.*)\. (.*)\s\s\</String1.*

FastPattern.description: Infected email cleaned/Unable to be cleaned

FastField.defaultValue: Infected email cleaned / Unable to be cleaned
